QuestData.Title: By the Skin of His Teeth
QuestData.Description: One of those mangy fleabags got Dempsey real good. We cannot move him until we stabilize his bleeding.$B$BGive us a hand holding back these mongrels. A couple of minutes is all we need, $Gbrother:sister;!
QuestData.AreaDescription: Survive while holding back the worgen for 2 minutes.
QuestData.LogDescription: Hold back the worgen atop the Gilneas City Prison for 2 minutes.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Lord Darius Crowley at the top of Stoneward Prison in Gilneas City.
QuestData.CompletionText: Getting there! Careful or we'll lose him!
QuestData.RewardText: We did it, $n. Thanks to you a good man has survived.
